View the Project on GitHub dale-findlay/portfolio-website

Overview

Ultimate Fun Noodle Championship is an arcade-style game in which the player must eat as many noodle bowls as possible in thirty seconds.

Languages & Skills Used:

  • Unity C#
  • Touch Input and Cross Platform Skills.
  • Creating a visual style
  • Defining a games design language.
